response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, I am confident it will be a significant asset to you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $1,350,000. This price reflects my desire to make this valuable resource accessible to you while ensuring a fair return for our investment. I look forward to discussing how this product can enhance your operations and contribute to your success. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me. Thank you for considering our offer.", "product_price": 1350000}
